entry.def: If you sit or stand astride something, you sit or stand with one leg on each side of it.

example.ex: ...three youths who stood astride their bicycles and stared.
example.tran: 站着跨在自行车上凝视的3个年轻人

means.word_mean: 1. with one leg on each side;
2. with the legs stretched far apart
